name: The Head Wizards Course
description:
Party like a King, which involves death.

You have been informed that a killer is among the guests at a public gathering in the throne room. As the head wizard, it is your duty to protect the king and defeat whoever acts suspicious or gets too close to the king.

Yes, this is related to the theme. Beat the (very short) game to find out how.

Entry for GlobalGameJam 2014

Theme was "We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are"
